snippet: The nearly thousand caucus sites include homes, churches and schools.
abstract: The nearly thousand caucus sites include homes, churches and schools.
lead_paragraph: Tonight will be the third time Sharon McNutt and her husband, Gary, will welcome caucus voters into their home in Silver City, Iowa, one of a handful of private locations that will bear witness to the first votes of the 2012 presidential election.

headline.main: Caucusing at Home, and Ready for Crowds
